name: Alexa for Business
short: A service that allows organizations to manage Alexa devices, skills, and users centrally.
description: Alexa for Business is a service that makes it easy to use Alexa to interact with your organization's resources. It lets you configure and manage Alexa-enabled devices, create custom skills, and integrate with existing enterprise systems like Active Directory, G Suite, and Office 365. It also offers features such as voice commands for conference room control, calendar management, and skill discovery. With its simple setup and automated maintenance, Alexa for Business simplifies voice interactions in the workplace.
